name: stadium-system
description: 1. Install Python 3.10+. 2. Create and activate a virtualenv. 3. Install dependencies: ```bash pip install -r requirements.txt ``` 4. Configure database in `stadium.env` (fallback `.env`): ``` DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:<password>@localhost:5432/stadium_db SECRET_KEY=change_me ``` 5. Ensure PostgreSQL database exists: ```bash createdb stadium_db ``` 6. Run app: ```bash python app.py ```
